title: Is it normal for your handwriting to change? - Quora

response.answer_text: Over time it may change for different reasons but there should be similarities that you can observe (even over time) because you’re an individual and who you are physically is fixed.

You’re handwriting changes over time. Think about how it looked when you were 5 or 6 whenever you learned how to write. Now look at it now. See the difference? There’s so much that ends up chaging. Just like how people change handwriting also changes. That’s just life ~Weirdo of Quora
